sf160:1: vadeta bhikṣus tīrṇā me kāṁkṣā vigatā me kathaṁkathā | atrocchinno me dṛṣṭiśalyaḥ | So Ed.: namety utāvartate; cf. SWTF s.v. pratyudāvṛt na me pratyudāvartate mānasaṁ paritasyam upādāya | kathaṁ syād dhi me ātmā |
sf160:2: tasya bhikṣor dhārmyāṁ kathāyāṁ kathyamānāyām āryāyāṁ lokottarāyāṁ
sf160:3: yad utāsmin satīdaṁ bhavaty asyotpādād idam utpadyate |
sf160:4: yad utāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṁskārāḥ pūrvavad yāvat samudayo nirodhaś ca bhavati |
sf160:5: ity evaṁrūpāyāṁ kathāyāṁ kathyamānāyāṁ bhavati kāṁkṣā bhavati vicikitsā aprapte prāptasaṁjñy anadhigate ’dhigatasaṁjñy asākṣākṛte sākṣākṛtasaṁjñī duḥkhī durmanā vipratisārī vihanyate vigatam āpadyate |
sf160:6: tat kasmād dhetoḥ | gaṁbhīram idaṁ sthānaṁ yad uta idaṁpratyayatā pratītyasamutpādaḥ | idam api sudurdarśataraṁ padaṁ yad uta sarvopadhipratiniḥsargas tṛṣṇākṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇam |
sf160:7: dvayam idaṁ saṁskṛtañ cāsaṁskṛtañ ca | tatra saṁskṛtasyotpādo ’pi prajñāyate vyayo ’pi sthityanyathātvam api | asaṁskṛtasya naivotpādaḥ prajñāyate na vyayo na sthityanyathātvam |
sf160:8: iti hi bhikṣavo duḥkhāḥ saṁskārāḥ | śāntaṁ nirvāṇam | hetusamudayād duḥkhasamudayaḥ | hetunirodhād duḥkhanirodhaḥ | chinnaṁ vartma na pravartate | apratisandhi nirudhyate | eṣa evānto duḥkhasya |
sf160:9: tatra bhikṣavaḥ kaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ anyatra yad duḥkhaṁ tan niruddhaṁ tad vyupaśāntaṁ tac chītībhūtaṁ tad astaṁgatam | śāntam idaṁ padaṁ yad uta sarvopadhipratiniḥsargas tṛṣṇākṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇam ||
